name: TeachMe
0:
”Alexa, open teach me”
”Give me an addition problem”
”Set the difficulty to easy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teach me
des: This skill allows you to easily practice basic math facts, like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division! It has a range of difficulties which lets the skill rise if difficulty as you get better and better! This skill is very good to give kids a way to practice their math skills easily and by themselves! Any suggestion for improvement would be greatly appreciated.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
